ThingDef.label: eyeglasses
ThingDef.description: A pair of regular ol' glasses, helps the wearer see better.

ThingDef.label: sunglasses
ThingDef.description: A pair of glasses tinted to protect the wearer's eyes from UV rays. Or just... to look cool when someone makes a quip or blows something up.

ThingDef.label: shoes
ThingDef.description: A fancy pair of leather shoes.

ThingDef.label: chef's uniform
ThingDef.description: A thick cloth coat protects from the heat of stoves and splattering of boiling liquids.

ThingDef.label: jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: A full body jumpsuit made out of thick fabric or leather. Excellent for general body protection and manual labour.

ThingDef.label: military uniform
ThingDef.description: A thick, protective coverall with a military camouflage.

ThingDef.label: medical scrubs
ThingDef.description: Sanitary clothing worn by surgeons, nurses and other workers involved in patient care. They are designed to be simple, easy to launder and cheap to replace if damaged or stained.

ThingDef.label: gloves
ThingDef.description: A simple pair of gloves.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap
ThingDef.description: A soft cap that keeps the sun out of the eyes of the wearer.

ThingDef.label: chef's hat
ThingDef.description: A tall hat worn by chefs.

ThingDef.label: fedora
ThingDef.description: A nice looking hat with a soft brim and indented crown.

ThingDef.label: Hardhat
ThingDef.description: A type of helmet used in work environments. Protects the wearer against bonks and debris.

ThingDef.label: military beret
ThingDef.description: A soft, hat that slouches to one side, often used by militaries.

ThingDef.label: Builder's Jacket
ThingDef.description: A jacket with highly reflective properties and a colour that is easily discernible from any background.\n\nMost industrial employees wear it as part of their personal protective equipment.

ThingDef.label: Lab Coat
ThingDef.description: A light coat worn to protect clothing from substances used in a lab.

ThingDef.label: Military Jacket
ThingDef.description: A thick fabric military formal jacket used for certain ceremonies, receptions and celebrations. It contains orders, medals insignia and campaign ribbons. It is considered a symbol of courage and valor.

ThingDef.label: overalls
ThingDef.description: A pair of bib-and-brace overalls perfect for working in the field.

ThingDef.label: Suit jacket
ThingDef.description: A nice looking suit jacket.

ThingDef.label: hoodie
ThingDef.description: A warm casual hoodie that doesn’t limit wearer’s movement.

ThingDef.label: surgical mask
ThingDef.description: A mask that is worn by surgeons, doctors and nurses to keep patients infection free.

ThingDef.label: scarf
ThingDef.description: A long piece of material that keeps the wearer's neck warm in cold and windy environments.

ThingDef.label: Casual T-Shirt
ThingDef.description: A casual T-Shirt with a cool sticker on it.

ThingDef.label: Fleece Shirt
ThingDef.description: A soft, checkered, breathable shirt perfect for working in the field.

ThingDef.label: Sheriff Shirt
ThingDef.description: A formal, thick buttoned-down shirt with a sheriff star on the chest. Provides wearer with a sense of pride and accomplishment.

ThingDef.label: Shirt and Tie
ThingDef.description: A nice looking collared shirt with buttons and a tie.

ThingDef.label: Tank Top
ThingDef.description: A sleeveless type of T-shirt, useful during prolonged exercise.

ThingDef.label: jeans
ThingDef.description: A pair of thick enough jeans to provide some degree of protection from damage and cold.

ThingDef.label: shorts
ThingDef.description: A pair of shorts, perfect for hot summer days.

ThingDef.label: skirt
ThingDef.description: A short skirt.

ThingDef.label: trousers
ThingDef.description: A nice looking set of suit trousers.
